wikitext.*:
{{stub}}
'''Deborah Webster Rogers''' wrote her doctoral dissertation on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and [[C.S. Lewis]] at the University of Wisconsin.<ref>''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Critical Biography]]'', "About the Authors" [p. 165]</ref>

==Bibliography==
===Books===
*[[1972]]: ''[[The Fictitious Characters of C.S. Lewis and J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' (doctoral dissertation)
*[[1982]]: ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien: A Critical Biography]]'' (with Ivor Rogers)

===Articles===
*[[1966]]: [[Orcrist 1|''Orcrist'' 1]]
**"Music To Read Tolkien By: Tunes for Two Poems"
*[[1970]]: [[Orcrist 4|''Orcrist'' 4]]
**"A Proposal for a Doctoral Dissertation in the Department of Comparative Literature at the University of Wisconsin-Madison"
*[[1975]]: ''[[A Tolkien Compass]]''
**"Everyclod and Everyhero: The Image of Man in Tolkien"
*[[1987]]: [[Mythlore 52|''Mythlore'' 52]]
**"Misery loves… A Root of Villainy"
